alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pierce, southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, north central Clinch and southeastern Appling Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Bristol, or 10 miles northwest of Blackshear, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alma, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Bristol, Cogdell, Dixie Union, New Lacy, Millwood and Bickley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Northern Ware; Pierce
